General.Name: Sunndal Sparebank
General.Description: Sunndal Sparebank provides various financial products and services to retail customers and SMEs. The company provides savings and pension accounts; payment and card solutions, such as bank cards, payment terminals, eGiro/OCR, billing, credit, online and mobile banking, international payments, and other payment services; bank, credit, value, and other cards; home and leisure, car and other vehicles, children, death fall, health, income, critical illness, disability, animals, as well as business, personnel, agricultural, and machinery and vehicles insurance; and car loans, mortgages, loans to other vehicles, and small loans and refinancing. It also offers financing solutions, including bank guarantees, construction loans, overdrafts, leasing, and business loans; and other accounts and services to businesses in construction, property, trade and services, and agriculture industries. Sunndal Sparebank was founded in 1892 and is based in Sunndalsøra, Norway.
